note: Each 3x3 matrix maps source coordinates to viewer coordinates (X,Y,Z). It is applied to world-space points as p' = M * p (implemented as pts @ M^T). Use the Flip toggles in the UI to correct handedness if needed.

presets.label: Axis Studio (template)
presets.description: Template for Axis Studio BVH. Start here, then use Flip toggles if the character faces the wrong way or appears mirrored. Once we receive a real Axis BVH, this preset will be frozen to the correct matrix.
